prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE (C 91046)
description: Comprehensive structural notes sheet containing the 2022 CBC fastening schedule (Table 2304.10.2), concrete specifications, foundation notes, general structural notes, structural wood specifications with lumber grade table, rebar specifications with cover table, and seismic/wind design criteria. This is the primary structural reference sheet for the project.
key_content: 2022 CBC Table 2304.10.2 Fastening Schedule — full nailing schedule for all framing connections (29+ line items)
Concrete: 2,500 PSI min at 28 days (flatwork), 3,000 PSI for walls, grade beams, and caissons; ASTM C150 Type II cement; ASTM C33 aggregates; 4" max slump for flatwork
Foundation: bearing pressure = 1500 PSF; footing depth at least 24 inches below lowest adjacent finished grade into competent soil
Structural wood: Douglas Fir-Larch, PS20-25; Joists & Planks No. 2; Beams & Stringers No. 1; Post and Timbers No. 1
Parallam (PSL): 2.0E WS (2900 Fb) and 2.2E WS (2900 Fb); Microllam (LVL): 2.0E WS (2900 Fb)
2x4 studs 8'-0" long: No. 1; 2x4 studs 8'-1" to 14'-0": No. 1; 2x6 studs: No. 2
Sill plates: pressure treated Douglas Fir (P.T.D.F.) with hot-dipped zinc galvanized or stainless steel fasteners (ASTM A153)
Plywood: APA Structural 1 rated sheathing with exterior glue, per DOC PS1 or PS2
Hardware: Simpson Company or engineer approved equal
Machine bolts: ASTM A307 Grade A; Anchor bolts: ASTM F1554 Grade 36; Nuts: ASTM A563 Hex Grade A; Threaded rods: ASTM A36; Washers: ASTM F436
Rebar: ASTM A615 Grade 60; non-welded ASTM A706 Grade 60; E80XX electrodes for welding per AWS D1.4-92
Rebar lap splices: #3-#6 = 48 bar diameters, #7-#11 = 56 bar diameters
Rebar cover: walls below grade (dirt side poured against) <3", walls below grade (formed) <2", slabs on earth <3", columns to main steel <2"
Seismic Design Category: D; Risk Category: II; Ss = 1.549, S1 = 0.560, SDS = 1.239, SD1 = 1.800; Site Class: D-Default
Seismic: V = 0.173 W (ASD) (includes Rho = 1.3); Cs = 0.191; R = 6.5 (plywood shearwalls), R = 2.5 (steel columns)
Analysis procedure: Equivalent Lateral Force Procedure
Wind: basic wind speed 110 MPH, Site Exposure B, Importance Factor 1.0
Dead loads: roof 15 PSF, floor 15 PSF; Live loads: roof 20 PSF, floor 40 PSF, deck 60 PSF (1.5 L)
Moisture content of wood at time of placing shall not exceed 19 percent
General notes: all materials per 2022 CBC; contractor to verify all dimensions; engineer approval required for material alternatives
NOT SHOWN: special inspection requirements list
NOT SHOWN: adhesive anchor specifications
NOT SHOWN: glulam combination grade specifications
NOT SHOWN: pressure-treated wood chemical retention requirements

drawing_zones.content: 2022 CBC Table 2304.10.2 Fastening Schedule — items 1-14 (blocking, ceiling joists, collar ties, rafters, studs, headers, top plates, bottom plates)
2022 CBC Table 2304.10.2 Fastening Schedule — items 15-29 (stud to plate, top plates, braces, sheathing, joists, subfloor, planks, girders, ledgers, bridging)
2022 CBC Table 2304.10.2 Fastening Schedule Continuation — sheathing/panel fastening specs
CONCRETE notes (8 items): cement ASTM C150 Type II, 2500 PSI min, 3000 PSI walls/beams/caissons, admixtures, conduit rules, control joints
FOUNDATION notes (7 items): bearing pressure 1500 PSF, footing 24" min depth, excavation requirements, sleeves, engineer responsibility
STRUCTURAL WOOD notes (15 items): lumber grade table (DFL, PSL, LVL specs), sill plate treatment, nailing, bolt specs, plywood, Simpson hardware, moisture content, ASTM bolt standards
REBAR notes (12 items): ASTM A615 Grade 60, lap splices (#3-#6=48 dia, #7-#11=56 dia), cover table, welded wire fabric, doweling requirements
GENERAL NOTES (9 items): precedence of notes, contractor verification, conflict resolution, utility location, 2022 CBC compliance, engineer responsibility
DESIGN CRITERIA: dead loads (roof 15 PSF, floor 15 PSF), live loads (roof 20 PSF, floor 40 PSF, deck 60 PSF), seismic data (SDC D, Ss=1.549, S1=0.560, SDS=1.239), wind (110 MPH, Exp B)
Ramirez Structural Inc firm block — Jose Ramirez PE, C 91046, contact info
Project info: 326 Flint Ave, New ADU Above (E) Garage, Long Beach CA 90814, Project No. 25-357, Date 9/19/25
